roleData.title: Data Engineer (Senior Design Project)
roleData.description: Developed an automated ETL and NLP pipeline integrating Python and LLM models to streamline clinical data extraction and submission for national PCI audits at NUHCS, targeting a 90% reduction in manual abstraction time.

roleData.title: Operations Intern
roleData.description: Built an Excel-based warehouse heatmap using SAP scan data across inbound, put away, picking, and outbound, adopted in weekly cross-functional reviews to prioritize aisle- and bin-level audits and accelerate hotspot remediation. Automated inventory workflows in Excel (VBA), trimming processing time by ~90% and improving reporting accuracy.

roleData.title: Industrial Engineering Intern
roleData.description: Designed and built a Python LPO fungibility model to compute RTN-to-RTN exchange ratios; parallelized workloads across 12 processors to reduce runtime from ~2.5 hours to ~30 minutes. Delivered an Excel-based UI and a PyInstaller executable for non-Python users; added one-to-many and many-to-one exchanges plus donate-by-wafer and receive-by-wafer features.

roleData.title: Computer Science Teacher
roleData.description: Delivered personalized Computer Science tutoring for Grades 10-12 (Python, Java); crafted individual learning plans and progress notes for parents, achieving ~2-3 grade-band improvement on average.
